ResearchProjectDef.label: genetic engineering
ResearchProjectDef.description: Research the basics of genetic engineering. With this research you can begin experimenting on the most basic creatures (tier 1), and breed hybrids to conquer the world.

ResearchProjectDef.label: insectoid genome
ResearchProjectDef.description: Research ways to extract genetic material from alien insectoid species. This opens up experimenting with insectoid hybrids (tier 2).

ResearchProjectDef.label: reptilian genome
ResearchProjectDef.description: Research ways to extract genetic material from reptiles. This opens up experimenting with reptilian hybrids (tier 2).

ResearchProjectDef.label: humanoid genetic engineering
ResearchProjectDef.description: Allows humanoid gene extraction, and allows mixing of human and animal DNA to create animal implants. Also opens up experimenting with hybrid implants, used to improve your hybrid creatures with incredibly weird combinations.

ResearchProjectDef.label: advanced genetic engineering
ResearchProjectDef.description: Unlocks the Advanced Gene Pod, and allows mixing of advanced creature genes, thrumbos and mechanoids (tier 3).

ResearchProjectDef.label: animal enrichment
ResearchProjectDef.description: Research ways to improve existing animals and create better adapted versions of them, known as Alphas.

ResearchProjectDef.label: age drugs
ResearchProjectDef.description: Research ways to accelerate the growth of your animals.

ResearchProjectDef.label: animal control
ResearchProjectDef.description: Mind control technology that allows you to directly interact with your creatures, unlocking player-controllable special abilities for each hybrid family.
